body: I got derailed reading these horrible translations because I thought, "What the fuck is a hexenbeist and why are they talking about it during sex??" And apparently it's a witch monster from the American fantasy police TV show Grimm. Just. Why.

Tbh this is kind of a joke. I’m usually all for the fucked losers to reimagine themselves and the pussythieves to get their karma, but with how much time went into the fall to depravity, it’s kind of laughable that the guy who had the patience to seduce a girl would be dumb enough to do something and go to jail

if you compare with the jp raw, some pages were switched. I think the translation team trolled the f out of vol 4 & vol 5. In summary from those two volumes: fmc continued being an onahole of the blond mf, until she was on movie date with derp mc, & she realized that derp mc was her soulmate, but the blond mf called her tricking her that he was depressed/sick, & because of continuous good sex & blonde magic dick, fmc who seem to fall in love with him came to him leaving the poor derp mc in their date & spent the rest of the night being fucked. So, the blond mf talked to derp mc humiliating derp mc and flexed his chad energy with fmc, where in the final sex scene, fmc told blond that he didn't have to be the one telling about their adventurous to derp mc. Epilogue derp mc became successful movie director & reminisced about his first relationship with fmc, fmc is unknown & blond got jail time & became trash. the end

No he didn't but the guy becomes has success in the film industry and during an interview mentions this experience and how it helped him grow. He now has a wife who also shares his love for cinema just like first girl and is happy. Last scene is him recalling a conversation they had about his health or something and how he'll live a long life can't remember it has something to do with the kanji in his name. There's an extra after this which that happens before this chapters and it shows him treating her like an onahole and how he thinks it's hilarious how fast her attitude towards him changed so fast with sex.she's falling more in love with blonde for some reason and thinks he loves her regardless of the treatment. Her friend knows she's cheating and gives more bad advice to not dump the kid just in case and have him as a rebound or some shit. Then when couple is watching a movie she realizes that he is his soulmate as he understands movies the same way she does and loves being with him and decides to dump the blonde guy. She goes to dump him but he gets her to have sex with him all night and records the last of that video.then this chapter where he lets the boyfriend know about the acts and how he got her hooked on sex and how dependent she became on him. Years later blonde guy is arrested/sued  his actions as he hasn't changed and still abusing women not said if the first girl involved.

She loved the boy and he loved her but he was to scared to confess and she...idk why she didn't confess first. Anyways she gets advice from friend that she should have sex experience first so they don't ruin their first time since being a virgin nowadays is out of style and to also make her more attractive or some shit so the boy confesses to her. She recommends that blonde(?) Guy. From what I can tell she used to be ugly/fat in the past and he rejected her cus of it or just was repulsed idk but she hates him because of that treatment and he wants to bang now that she's pret.  They have sex she loves it and a while after the boy conffesses but now she's addicted to sex with blonde. The couple has sex also but she can't forget other guy as she keeps calling her out for sex.
